Verses: 1 allelooyaa, Vaanangalil Ullavaigale, Karththaraith Thudhiyungal; Unnadhangalil Avaraith Thudhiyungal.
2 avarudaiya Thoodhargale, Neengal Yaavarum Avaraith Thudhiyungal; Avarudaiya Senaigale, Neengal Yaavarum Avaraith Thudhiyungal.
3 sooriya Sandhirare, Avaraith Thudhiyungal; Piragaasamulla Sagala Natchaththirangale, Avaraith Thudhiyungal.
4 vaanaadhi Vaanangale, Avaraith Thudhiyungal; Aagaayamandalaththin Melulla Thanneergale, Avaraith Thudhiyungal.
5 avaigal Karththarin Naamaththaith Thudhikkakkadavadhu; Avar Kattalaiyida Avaigal Sirushtikkappattadhu.
6 avar Avaigalai Endraikkumulla Sadhaagaalangalilum Nilaikkumpadi Seydhaar; Maaraadha Piramaanaththai Avaigalukku Niyamiththaar.
7 boomiyilullavaigale, Karththaraith Thudhiyungal; Magaa Machchangale, Sagala Aazhangale,
8 akkiniye, Kalmazhaiye, Uraindhamazhaiye, Moodupaniye, Avar Sorpadi Seyyum Perungaatre,
9 malaigale, Sagala Medugale, Kanimarangale, Sagala Kedhurukkale,
10 kaattumirugangale, Sagala Naattumirugangale, Oorum Piraanigale, Iragulla Paravaigale,
11 boomiyin Raajaakkale, Sagala Janangale, Pirabukkale, Boomiyilulla Sagala Niyaayaadhipadhigale,
12 vaalibare, Kannigaigale, Mudhirvayadhullavargale, Pillaigale, Karththaraith Thudhiyungal.
13 avargal Karththarin Naamaththaith Thudhikkakkadavargal; Avarudaiya Naamam Maaththiram Uyarndhadhu; Avarudaiya Magimai Boomikkum Vaanaththirkum Melaanadhu.
14 avar Thammudaiya Parisuththavaangal Yaavarukkum, Thammaich Serndha Janamaagiya Isravel Puththirarukkum Kondaattamaaga, Thammudaiya Janaththirku Oru Kombai Uyarththinaar. Allelooyaa.
